title: my skin dosen't work
body: hi  i bought dark star thresh by rp but when i try to use in game this skin lable skin is disable idk why it dosen't work

replies.body: As Sukishoo stated, there was an in game bug that was severely impacting gameplay, particularly for the enemy team, which is why the skin was disabled (sorry about that!) We've had a team working throughout the weekend, and we are in the process of verifying a fix, which means you should be able to use him again in game soon! Again, super sorry for the trouble!
If you look in the top corner of the client it currently tells you that the skin is disabled due to in-game issues. So you cannot use it until they fix it.
